typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address,string memory) view external returns (uint256,bool,address,bytes32,string memory)

nodes.documentation:
@dev Get accountRecoveryLockDuration setting
@return accountRecoveryLockDuration = The amount of time for current Speaker of Name to response and replace the eth address associated with the Name
nodes.name: _getAccountRecoveryLockDuration

getAccountRecovery(address).details: Get AccountRecovery information given a Name ID
getAccountRecovery(address).return: the submit status of the account recoverysubmittedTimestamp - Timestamp when this account recovery is submittedlockedUntilTimestamp - The deadline for the current Speaker of Name to respond and replace the new eth address

isCompromised(address).details: Check whether or not current Name is compromised,	i.e an account recovery has been submitted and waiting for	action from Speaker

setAOSettingAddress(address).details: The AO sets AO Setting address

setNameFactoryAddress(address).details: The AO set the NameFactory Address

setNameNewAddress(address,address).details: Speaker of Name respond to AccountRecovery and submits a new eth address for Name

setNamePublicKeyAddress(address).details: The AO set the NamePublicKey Address

setNameTAOPositionAddress(address).details: The AO set the NameTAOPosition Address

setSettingTAOId(address).details: The AO sets setting TAO ID

params._settingTAOId: The new setting TAO ID to set

setWhitelist(address,bool).details: Whitelist `_account` address to transact on behalf of others

submitAccountRecovery(address).details: Listener of Name submits an account recovery for the Name

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfer ownership of The AO to new address

params._theAO: The new address to be transferred
